heading: HJR0028
0: A JOINT RESOLUTION PROVIDING FOR A SUPPLEMENTAL BUDGET OF TEN BILLION PESOS (P10 B) TO BE IMMEDIATELY RELEASED TO THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY AND DIRECTING THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY TO EXCLUSIVELY USE THE AMOUNT TO URGENTLY PROCURE FOR THE PERIOD SEPTEMBER 2018 TO JANUARY 2019 AT LEAST 500,000 METRIC TONS OF PALAY FROM LOCAL RICE FARMERS AT THE FARM GATE PRICE OF TWENTY PESOS (P20) PER KILOGRAM IN ORDER TO EASE THE RICE CRISIS THAT IS DEVASTATING THE POOR OF THIS COUNTRY
principal-authors: CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B.; ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T.; TINIO, ANTONIO L.; BROSAS, ARLENE D.; CASTRO, FRANCE L.; ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.;
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2018-09-18
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HJR0028
FULL TITLE : A JOINT RESOLUTION PROVIDING FOR A SUPPLEMENTAL BUDGET OF TEN BILLION PESOS (P10 B) TO BE IMMEDIATELY RELEASED TO THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY AND DIRECTING THE NATIONAL FOOD AUTHORITY TO EXCLUSIVELY USE THE AMOUNT TO URGENTLY PROCURE FOR THE PERIOD SEPTEMBER 2018 TO JANUARY 2019 AT LEAST 500,000 METRIC TONS OF PALAY FROM LOCAL RICE FARMERS AT THE FARM GATE PRICE OF TWENTY PESOS (P20) PER KILOGRAM IN ORDER TO EASE THE RICE CRISIS THAT IS DEVASTATING THE POOR OF THIS COUNTRY
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CASILAO, ARIEL "KA AYIK" B., ZARATE, CARLOS ISAGANI T., TINIO, ANTONIO L., BROSAS, ARLENE D., CASTRO, FRANCE L., ELAGO, SARAH JANE I.
DATE FILED : 2018-09-12
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2018-09-18
